homePage.metaData: This is the meta data description of the website. It helps search engines to better summarize your page. Write a short description here.

header.title: Pour yourself a glass of refreshing innovation

aboutSection.title: Who we are
aboutSection.description: LEMONADEZ consists of four highly motivated master's students of computer science and chemical engineering. Each of us brings a unique set of skills and experience to the table, including web development, mobile app development, machine learning, IoT development, and more. We are eager to participate in this hackathon and work collaboratively to develop innovative solutions. As a team, we are passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems and are excited to apply our expertise to this challenge. We thrive in a fast-paced and challenging environment and are committed to producing high-quality work. With our diverse skill set and collaborative spirit, we are confident that we can create impactful and innovative solutions.

competences.title: Web Development
competences.description: Our team has experience in developing web applications using a variety of technologies.

competences.title: Mobile Development
competences.description: Our team has experience developing both native and cross-platform mobile applications for both Android and iOS.

competences.title: Innovative Approach
competences.description: We are always looking for new and creative ways to solve problems and create practical solutions that make a difference.

projects.title: LetterBot
projects.description: Development of an AI-power web motivation letter generator.

projects.title: Allergone
projects.description: Allergone helps people with allergies to find places to eat. People with allergies can finally find places to eat using a mobile or web app.

projects.title: RoboLiga 2023
projects.description: 1st place in FRI Robo league of 2023.
